title: All champs reliant on DFG will get "Changes"...
body: But I don't see any Kat changes, thanks Rito... {{champion:55}}

replies.body:
Oh, so they will be in the future? 
Sorry if I'm mi-stake-n. {{champion:67}} {{champion:8}}

it kinda makes me sick that riot is buffing champs because of dfg removal. Literally all of the champs are perfectly fine without it. For example, kat can easily penta a team and im sorry.. DFG isnt the make or break of that happening.

Honestly if you build DFG on Kat you're bad anyway.
Riot doesn't realize how much they ruined Akali with the change, then they nerf her and not Zed.. morons lmao.
